subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan scored, then jumped into David Beckham’s arms, and the Los Angeles Galaxy celebrated its fifth win in six games with a 2-1 victory over the New England Revolution.
snippet: Landon Donovan scored, then jumped into David Beckham’s arms, and the Los Angeles Galaxy celebrated its fifth win in six games with a 2-1 victory over the New England Revolution.
